text: IRM 6.300.1, Appointment Determinations and Policies, dated August 1, 2002, has been superseded. Current and applicable guidance previously found in IRM 6.300.1 and other official Servicewide policy have been moved to this and other IRMs, which have been renumbered to follow the numbering format in Title 5 of the Code of Federal Regulations (CFR).
